short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity with scheduled site blocking,custom blocklist,and password protection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your attention on the task and increase output using our major features: Scheduled site blocking, a custom blocklist, and password protection.

Utilize BlockSite to prioritize productivity.

On Chrome, do you want to restrict websites? With our free site blocker extension, we have you covered. To ensure that websites won't distract you, simply add them to your block list. If you attempt to visit a website that is on your block list while it is blocked, we'll even throw in some hilarious memes and images. 

Be more concentrated
Over 5 million individuals use the program and website blocker Blocksite globally. You can use BlockSite to temporarily block distracting websites and apps to improve your focus, productivity, and self-control. 

Features 

Target Mode

Utilizing the Pomodoro approach, focus mode enables you to manage your schedule. Divide your duties into 25-minute periods, with a 5-minute break in between. You can configure specified times to restrict websites and times to surf freely with "Focus Mode." 

Adult Material

Ever wished you could filter adult content? The Network Privacy Defence addon makes this simple to do. By default, our adult blocker filters out all pornographic websites to ensure that you never see any offensive or undesired information.

Planned mode

Make up your own daily timetable and routine if you feel like you need a little additional push to keep on track. You can schedule specific days and times when you can visit particular or previously prohibited websites using the "Scheduling" tool. 

Individualized Block Page 

Get imaginative now, please! By selecting your own images and text to display while visiting a banned page, you may now design your own blocked pages. 

Remove Prevention 

Nobody can delete the program from your devices without your knowledge or permission thanks to the uninstall prevention feature.

Redirect to Site (Premium Feature)

When you attempt to access a prohibited app or website, you will be transferred to an alternative website so you may resume your attention (for instance, if you block YouTube and attempt to access it, you can opt to be redirected to your email).

Sync

You can disable anything on your computer or phone on your mobile device as well. To stay focused wherever you are, you may sync prohibited websites, keywords, and password protection.

Insights

On BlockSite, examine your web browsing trends! With our insights function, you can now see how much time you spend online and on which websites. Additionally, you may see how much time you've saved, which website categories you visit the most, and other information.
